website_summaries.verdict: This lightweight basket is easy to fold without sacrificing size for portability.
pros: Despite the foldable design, this basket is still tournament-size and has a durable zinc-plated design
Customers have few complaints and like that the basket is sturdy enough to stay upright in strong winds
cons: The flag is flimsy and prone to breaking

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and son so they could practice in the yard or take to friends houses to practice. I like that it comes with a carrying case (people have mistaken it for a fold up chair) but it is very heavy. We live on the second floor and it is heavy to take down or bring up the steps. It does have a shoulder trap but I can't carry it on my shoulder most of the time my husband has to carry it. Setting it up is extremely and my 11 year old can put it together all by himself.
customer_reviews.author: cvlloyd79

customer_reviews.title: The Best Portable Basket
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my SO for his birthday. He had been talking about getting a basket for the backyard and a portable one for camping, trips to the beach, park, whatever. We currently have it set up in the backyard for family time He has been extremely impressed with this basket, especially the size and that it has double rows of chains. It's very sturdy and the fabric seems well made. We will be spraying it with 303 Fabric Guard to protect it. His brother has the Innovo portable basket, and the DGA Mach Lite is superior.
customer_reviews.author: Tahoe Gal

customer_reviews.title: Portable Disc Golf
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely sturdy and well made. Husband and son set it up in the house and were playing Christmas day. The chains are heavy duty and plenty of them to stop/slow down the discs. The tri-pod is sturdy. The mesh is of excellent quality. This unit is heavy enough at 40 pounds, but transportable and comes with a carry bag. Bag is also heavy duty nylon. Excellent, well constructed equipment. Worth the additional cost, imo.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Walker

customer_reviews.title: High quality and solid
customer_reviews.text: A bit cumbersome and balky to assemble and disassemble but it is a high quality product
customer_reviews.author: Coop

customer_reviews.title: Great practice basket!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a graduation gift for my SO and he loves it! He's able to set it up in his apartment, backyard, or basically anywhere. We've also taken it camping with us and set it up at our campsite. It's super easy to assemble and pack away, and comes in a nice carrying case. The chains on it are a bit loud, especially for an apartment or campground setting, but we've found that if you lay a towel around the bottom of the chains, it quiets them down to a softer level. 10/10 would recommend for anyone who wants to practice on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for quarantine life
customer_reviews.text: My husband is obsessed with this, its been great for quarantine and he has even hauled it with us camping. It's very sturdy but easy to move, although a little heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Bec

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this DG hole
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this DG hole. It has seen more than its fair share of use and is still holding up fine. I bought a Innova DISCatcher Traveler Target and my friend got this one. Immediately it was obvious that this basket was of much much better quality and more like the real thing. I returned the innova and got this Mach Lite instead. It travels very well and is always being used when I take it places. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: jworrin

customer_reviews.title: Great Portability and Design
customer_reviews.text: It's not perfect, but it's great for what it is- it's very portable and honestly it looks nice compared to a lot of the other baskets. My only minor comments are that the chains spit out a lot of stuff, but I think that's fine for a practice basket so it wont affect my review, and also, I wish that the carrying bag had some sort of way you could carry it like a backpack rather than a lawn chair, but still, it's very portable.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Neuhaus

customer_reviews.title: Well built target
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my son. He hasn't used it yet but we set it up in the house and then stored it in the included canvas bag. This thing is heavy duty!!! I would fully expect this to last for years. It takes about 3 minutes to assembly and about the same to tear down and store. The only thing that doesn't seem to have a home is the flag and fiberglass flagpole. It is heavy. Amazon had it at 26 pounds. I didn't weigh but I would have put it heavier than that.
customer_reviews.author: M Stelter

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with DGA Mach Lite Portable Disc Golf Basket
customer_reviews.text: I have had it two months. I collapse the top and bottom and carry it to the backyard for practice. Very easy to move. I also practice indoors. A chain came loose but I was able to reconnect it. I think it is great for practicing. First time assembly took just a few minutes. After that it is super easy to move. I have not tried breaking it down for transport in the carry bag so I have no comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: A. Benson

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be fairly well designed
customer_reviews.text: The initial one time unboxing and setup was a minor challenge. The chains were somewhat twisted and I needed to execute the setup in a specific order to remediate. On a go forward basis it will not be a problem. Carrying bag is certainly big enough to carry the target. It's of ample size and does not require much finesse to store the target. Long as the bag is treated with some care it should last for a little while.
customer_reviews.author: Just the Facts

customer_reviews.title: Good quality portable basket.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to collapse and set up. The first couple times you use it, the basket is stiff for stujp/tear down, but breaks in quickly and set up/tear down should take less than a minute. It fits easily in a trunk of a midsize sedan, or across a back seat. The storage bag for transport is well made and has held up to frequent use.
customer_reviews.author: Chel7

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Can't believe how much my putting has improved in just two days. No, it isn't meant to stick on the side of a steep hill. The legs deploy evenly. So, if steep hills are your thing, bring some kind of spacers. If you want a tool that will help you improve your putting without driving to a course and to have some fun with friends, this is a great item.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Baggynz

customer_reviews.title: Great product but cheaper elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Great product, portable and more heavy duty than other portable baskets. I does seem a little harder than a normal basket, but I think that’s a good thing. My only issue is that I now see it for sale other places for $25 less and Amazon doesn’t price match. Check out gottagogottathrow before u buy here
customer_reviews.author: Tim Mader-Brown

customer_reviews.title: Solid portable basket
customer_reviews.text: Very good for on the go.. Good chains for practicing at home or wherever. Only thing I dont like is it doesnt sit straight all the time. When the top is inserted into the base the pole leans a bit. Kind of frustrating.. Otherwise a GREAT product
customer_reviews.author: gregory rivera

customer_reviews.title: the quality is good. The ease of use is good
customer_reviews.text: This product is a bit heavier than we expected it to be. Overall, the quality is good. The ease of use is good. We use this in the house until we want to go take it to travel. We have a real basket at home that stays outdoors, this is for travel and indoors for us. We LOVE it. Practice putting indoors when the weather is crummy is pretty nice.
customer_reviews.author: KMReynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: After doing some research into which portable disc golf basket to purchase I am pleased to say that I am extremely happy with my choice. The DGA Mach Lite is a breeze to set up, rock-solid when catching a disc, and a great way to get some practice in! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Schlaefflin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted in a Portable Target
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy and solid, the chains are thick and heavy. It is excellent. It is a little too heavy to carry too far, but not being quite as lightweight as some other portable baskets I've seen, it is also a lot more sturdy. I agree with some other reviews I've read, in that the flag is flimsy and I'm sure that once it's hit, it will die. Also, the strap on the carrying bag could have a pad for the shoulder. Even so, it suits my purposes to a tee. I take it somewhere, set it up, and use it as a practice basket or play games with it, with the kids. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Very nice basket
customer_reviews.text: Nice basket. I love being able to set up in my yard and practice, although I do not set up nearly enough. The basket seems to be very durable. DGA products are very nice and they seem to always add just a little more to their products. A friend has the Innova basket and I would definitely recommend the DGA as the basket to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Efjoyce

customer_reviews.title: This basket is awesome and has received great feedback from everyone I've played ...
customer_reviews.text: This basket is awesome and has received great feedback from everyone I've played with. I recently purchased 3 more baskets for the office. I timed how long it takes to assemble.. 27 seconds. Fits in my trunk and front seat.. very easy to transport. And unlike other portables, very stable with a good catch and nice chain crash sound. Definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer J Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Nice basket, submarvellous packaging
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Mach Lite basket so I could practice putting in my back yard. The first time I set it up, it took about 5 minutes to figure out. Now, the setup takes maybe 30 seconds. Like other reviewers indicated, the flag stick will snap the first time you hit it. Also, the tripod legs are really thin and will do a number on putters if you come up short and hit them. The packaging was pretty torn up but the item itself was fine, aside from the fact that I ordered the blue basket but received a red one. But red catches discs just as well as blue, and this basket does its job well.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Mayhew

customer_reviews.title: ... this as a gift from my wife and I love it. Packs up and assembles quickly and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a gift from my wife and I love it. Packs up and assembles quickly and it is made with quality materials. I would not leave it exposed to the elements though. Overall an outstanding product!
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't think twice, buy this basket!
customer_reviews.text: I've been playing disc golf for a few months now and I'm lucky enough to have one of the top courses in the country 10 minutes from me. There are some days though where I just can't make it there and I decided to do research online for a portable basket to practice at home. The Mach Lite is incredibly easy to set up and weighs about 30 lbs. roughly. The chains are heavy duty and will catch your throws no problem without rocking or wobbling around. The only issue I had was the flag breaking off from a overshot putt, but that's minor and very easy to replace. I can't say enough good things about my Mach Lite!
customer_reviews.author: Damien

customer_reviews.title: ... currently available and I think that I made a great choice. This basket is very well made I ...
customer_reviews.text: I had done a lot of research on the different baskets that are currently available and I think that I made a great choice. This basket is very well made I have been using it for at least an hour a day since I got it. The basket reacts a lot like the baskets at my local courses. I am really happy with just how easy it is to set up and take down. If your looking for a great basket that can be taken anywhere and used anytime this is the one for you!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Heavier than I though it would be.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, wish price was a little lower, but not bad. Catches pretty good and so far so good. Great to travel with when visiting friends, family and go camping.
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: Torn after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband and he really loved it. But after two months of use it has started to tear.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as advertised. The legs can be a little bit flimsy at times. Overall I'd give it 4/5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend 2 years ago. I did a bunch of research to make sure I found a good quality one. He confirmed that it was great quality. It was also really easy to setup. This would be great for a large open area! It's very sturdy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Mach Lite is the best on the market
customer_reviews.text: This portable disc gold set up is the beat on the market. Super easy to set up. It’s light weight and can be thrown in a trunk or the back of your pickup. Buy one and thank me later
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Smith

customer_reviews.title: great for a home based disc golf course
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grown son for Christmas. He and his compadres play disc golf SOMEWHERE 300 days a Year. They all love it. He has started a home course and loves how closely this basket mimics the better baskets in our area, and he loves being able to change the course any time he wants. great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Everhart

customer_reviews.title: Everything you could want in a portable basket!
customer_reviews.text: This basket is probably one of the best practice baskets you can get on the market. Occasionally the disc will pass though the chains due to the lightweight and portability factors. I have had this basket for months and use it frequently. The only con to this basket is the flag on top is totally useless as it will break even on the softest impact but I rigged a compression spring to take the place of the plastic dowel rod and works great. I would recommend this basket to anyone looking for a durable and portable basket.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas james whited

customer_reviews.title: Love this basket
customer_reviews.text: Love this basket! Durable and very nice to setup in a backyard or take it with us to a friends!
customer_reviews.author: NayNay

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up and break down
customer_reviews.text: easy to set up and break down, durable yet easy to transport. excellent quality materials, fun for our whole family in the yard, at the beach, or camping!
customer_reviews.author: jasmine graves

customer_reviews.title: Really great!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Got two of them. Instant course and putting practice. Set-up is less than a minute. Light (not light enough to carry two of them and your bag to a distant hilltop... but...) Totally recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Cloud

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, very high quality construction! Easy set up and breakdown.
customer_reviews.author: Kramirez

customer_reviews.title: Fast set up and take down. Catches awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Easier to set up and put away that I thought. And I thought it would be easy. Fits in my small sedan trunk with ease. Great at catching and great for practicing. Super fun. Probably my best DG purchase ever. Don't buy that new high speed driver. Save up, get a basket and some more putters. You will beat your friends!
customer_reviews.author: Noah Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Outside Chain Sent Broken
customer_reviews.text: Great basket if everything was sent as it should have been. Out side chain was not connect with the inner ring. Disappointing to have a nice basket with this malfunction.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Oostindie

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to remind you that no matter how much ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tool to remind you that no matter how much better you think you are getting, you will never be great at putting.
customer_reviews.author: DixieChicksfan79

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Chains a little too thin.
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. Ver fun. Very easy to assemble. Very mobile. One thing that could be better is the chains. Thicker chains would make it perfect. Chains are very thin and discs go through and out sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wade Evans II

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I can't recommend this enough. Well constructed and holds up to panhandle winds. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Agb451

customer_reviews.title: Weighs enough so that it doesn't blow over in the wind but is still easy to transport to the park or campground
customer_reviews.text: Daughter bought this for her boyfriend, and he loves it. Weighs enough so that it doesn't blow over in the wind but is still easy to transport to the park or campground. Love that it comes with a case.
customer_reviews.author: willis kleinjan

customer_reviews.title: Mach Lite Disc Golf Target
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my son and he absolutely loves it. He says it is an easy set up and take down. It is sturdy and well designed. He was also proud of his mom for doing her "research" and getting the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: gemdee

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Durable & super fun
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Durable & super fun! A little on the heavy side for trekking any long distance with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: but I am pleased so far
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably fast shipping! On a whim I bought this on a Sunday afternoon at 2:30 on my cell phone. It was at my front door the next day when I got hone from work at 3:30!! A little heavy and concerned the strap on the bag might fail, but I am pleased so far!
customer_reviews.author: Wahd

customer_reviews.title: Love this game and I don't play disc golf
customer_reviews.text: Love this game and I don't play disc golf. Great way for a non-golfer to learn, and for anyone to practice.and improve. Quick and easy to set up and take down. Sturdy and works well on uneven ground. Love that it has the carrying case too. I am buying another for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Robin M

customer_reviews.title: It's the bees knees!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to assemble, easy to pack and tote, a must buy for any outdoor enthusiast!
customer_reviews.author: Hodge721

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Basket!!!
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up for a birthday gift for my brother. It works great, very easy to setup once you use it once. The whole basket is built to last. I need to pick one up for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Bacardi79

customer_reviews.title: Led
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected, works great. Seems to grab just about anything we throw at it. Folds up easily, I would like another one.
customer_reviews.author: Cheesehead

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my boyfriend who loves disc golf, his friend also has one and they love setting up their own short courses together and say these are easy to transport and work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jen H.

customer_reviews.title: Like this basket
customer_reviews.text: Simple, easy to setup and disassemble. I wanted a portable basket that is easy to take with me and quick to setup. This fit the bill and I am very happy with the purchase thus far.
customer_reviews.author: J. Forsythe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fun and easy to set up/take down. It stores very nicely in its bag.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Sabatino

customer_reviews.title: great unit but could be better with little effort.
customer_reviews.text: Overall it is a nice target. Sturdy, sets up easily with no tools, even comes with a bag... I just wish it had 5 legs to make it more stable in wind and sloped surfaces. But dont get me wrong. This very nice for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Scott-e-b

customer_reviews.title: Love that this is DGA certified
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is DGA certified. So easy to set up and take down. Surprised at how the chains don't tangle! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Misfit

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: After reading through all reviews, I decided to purchase this basket and am very pleased with it! Easy set-up, quality product and lots of fun to play with the entire neighborhood. I bought one and set up a 9 hole course with different approaches to each hole. Everyone loves it so far! The portability is a huge advantage of this basket over the metal ones in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: daveambrose

customer_reviews.title: Functionality is great.
customer_reviews.text: Disc was a little too high and broke the flag clean off. Not that important, but that's the only reason I'm giving it a 4/5. Functionality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Arron Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product and easy to set up and put away! A little heavy, but too bad. Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Julie M Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Disc Golf Target
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Was I impressed by this item. Very high quality and a carrying bag that is ez to use and fits well. I purchased two for the grandkids and my son to practice on. The double chains are a must and they had no "bounce outs". It set up easily. The chains are heavy duty and coated so shouldn't rust. Sturdy and well constructed. Were more expensive than most I looked at but I am a value shopper and I received value through this purchase. Highly recommend it. The shipping package and boxes assured they arrived without damage. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: McDermittMarvel

customer_reviews.title: Great target. Poorly designed tripod base.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome, folds down easily and the basket and chain assembly are perfect. 4 out of 5 because the base is poorly designed and on the weak side. The sharp tripod legs definitely gouge out discs. A tubular system would have been much better.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M Gomez

customer_reviews.title: The perfect pratice basket
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy Good pratice target Lots of fun alone or with the family Great product for a large or small yard
customer_reviews.author: Shelli4n

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for practice. A bit heavy, but you shouldn't be going backpacking with it.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Byrnes

customer_reviews.title: Great target!
customer_reviews.text: Kick butt target! My husband has had this for about a month and continually raves about how much he loves the target. He has said that this target is better than any other portable he has used. It takes him about 1 minute to set it up and another minute to put it away. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Schlegel

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Residents of Nursing Home love to play
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Residents of Nursing Home love to play games
customer_reviews.author: packerjean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Bsaket, keep it in the back of the truck perfect for Killin time!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great basket. Good design for fast setup and quick ...
customer_reviews.text: Great basket. Good design for fast setup and quick teardown. Catches very good, have tried to make discs spit out, simply hasn't happened yet. Excellent basket for an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Reid Randall

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend and he LOVES it! His putting has improved significantly. Easy to assemble, high quality, portable.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Great portable unit
customer_reviews.text: Really nice portable unit. Works great! I would recommend this product for anyone not wanting to put up a permanent basket.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this basket
customer_reviews.text: I love this basket. I might add a couple more chains to it. some 20+ foot putts can go right through it. Its holding up great and i expect to have it for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Simply awesome
customer_reviews.text: Loving this goal! VERY easy to setup and take down. The design just reaches out and grabs disc's. Item was shipped immediately and arrived before expected.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great basket heavy duty very easy to pack up and take where ever
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality Target
customer_reviews.text: This target is well built, easily moved, and is a great asset for any Disc golfer. Practice, practice, practice....then practice some more.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality, well engineered steel and fabric basket. Very smart design collaspses in seconds with a totable bag. I am looking for a reason to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Denizen

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this product. Sometimes the disc falls through but that was expected considering its portability. The only downfall is the crappy flag it comes with. Mine isn't broken yet but I can see why many others are.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Shaw

customer_reviews.title: awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This bad boy will not disappoint! It arrived 2 days early, set up in two minutes and is actual size of a basket. Wasnt sure to get a skillshot or mach lite. I am do freakin glad I went with my gut an dished a few extra bones on the mach lite! Skillshot isnt even comparable!
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time like promised. Easy to setup takes less than 5 mins from being in the travel bag to ready to go. Great chains with an inner and outer layer. Great Product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look no further
customer_reviews.text: I've seen both the innova skillshot and traveler in person and while they are fine disc targets the Mach lite is the obvious choice. It looks the most like a real disc target and has amazing quality. Buy the Mach lite, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Best portable basket
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Bag is mostly for storage, not transport. Quality construction, easy assembly/erection/collapse. Flag will break quickly, i don't usually put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Aaronkcmo

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: Assembled it in 1 minute out the package. It's durable and it approximates the size of a standard basket very well. I love this product, and the price is right!
customer_reviews.author: Toly D.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and the basket is so sweet
customer_reviews.text: Great buy and the basket is so sweet, it folds up and fits into a smaller bag and its very easy to carry from place to place. great buy
customer_reviews.author: Zack C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and pretty easy to carry around in ...
customer_reviews.text: Really well made portable net. Easy to assemble and pretty easy to carry around in it's bag with strap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems weld made and provides a great target for putting practice.
customer_reviews.author: Todd McMahon

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Good size basket. Sturdy for the fact that it is portable. Good value for the price. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: It came in great packaging, and was easy to assemble. We had a lot of fun setting it in various places around the yard and playing. We're newbies, so we're still trying to figure out how to throw the discs. It has pins to collapse the basket, slip the carrier over the top, remove the tripod and stuff it into the side pocket, and it's stored for the next time. We did use a burlap bag over the tripod so that the metal edges wouldn't stress the side pocket more than they had to. Overall, we love it!
customer_reviews.author: hsk

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, nice it is portable by sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, nice it is portable by sturdy! The flag snapped off right away from a disc hitting it but otherwise very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Zygutis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I wanted. Heavy duty yet portable.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Couldnt be happier
customer_reviews.text: I seriously couldnt be happier with my purchase. Easy to set up, really great craftsmanship, and beautiful. The double chains really make it awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Chad R. Weismiller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The basket is great so portable and easy to set up thanks
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bighinatti

customer_reviews.title: Great disc golf target. Very easy to assemble and fun to use in our back yard or to take in our car.
customer_reviews.text: Great disc golf target. Very easy to assemble and fun to use in our back yard or to take in our car.
customer_reviews.author: juan j moreno

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Feels like a quality setup and is very easy to set up
customer_reviews.author: Bobby B.

customer_reviews.title: Improve you game!
customer_reviews.text: Great portable basket. Very well designed and easy to set up. There will certainly be more chain outs and putts that don't stay in compared to a normal basket but it is great for practice. I'm perfectly happy to have a couple chain outs while practicing in order to have such a portable basket. Seriously, buy this basket a improve your game!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: solid and awesome
customer_reviews.text: bought it as a birthday present for my boyfriend and he loves it. It is amazingly stable without having any pegs holding it down and it packs up quickly. Great for gorilla golfing.
customer_reviews.author: april

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping although the first throw of a disk hit the flag on top and it snapped..ide buy another for sure oy
customer_reviews.author: erica benjamin

product_meta.title: DGA Mach Lite Portable Disc Golf Practice Basket
product_meta.description: The DGA Mach Lite portable and collapsible disc golf practice basket weighs only 25 pounds, opens and closes easily, and stores conveniently in it's own durable carrying bag with strap. Sling this collapsible practice disc golf basket on your back and easily set it up as a disc golf target for practice shots. It features high quality patented catching chain design, and patented sliding links. The DGA Mach Lite frame is zinc plated and the basket and top outer shells are made of heavy duty nylon. The DGA Mach Lite is not suitable for permanent outdoor installation. The basket is easy to fold into its sturdy nylon carrying bag to store indoors. Pdga approved, professionally tested. One of disc golf Association's best selling portable practice baskets.
feature_bullets: By DGA, the Founding company of disc golf and the standard for disc golf baskets. Regulation size collapsible portable disc golf target perfect for practice. Easy to fold, move and store
Excellent, lightweight, high quality disc golf target for practice, playing casual disc golf at the park, the beach, camping or in the backyard
The DGA Mach Lite basket can foldup and is portable and durable for travel. The target is transportable, easy to set up and folds together in it's own carrying bag with shoulder strap
The DGA Mach Lite practice target is the best foldable basket that is the same size as a standard Tournament disc golf basket
